creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: twill weave with vertical stripes in varying widths and patterns; some stripes are "ikat-like"; colors are red, green, white and blue; attached 1 1/2" fringe all around in same colors
dimension:
27 1/4 x 33 3/4 in. (69.22 x 85.73 cm)
1 1/2 in. (3.81 cm) (object part, fringe all around)
title: Servilleta
